name: Indian Education Program, Title VI
description: Indian Education Program supports the unique educational and culturally related academic needs of American Indian/Alaskan Native students as it connects to their cultural, emotional and social wellbeing in the SF USD.
fullDescription: Indian Education Program supports the unique educational and culturally related academic needs of American Indian/Alaskan Native students as it connects to their cultural, emotional and social wellbeing in the SF USD.
whatTheyOffer: Indian Education Program supports the unique educational and culturally related academic needs of American Indian/Alaskan Native students as it connects to their cultural, emotional and social wellbeing in the SF USD.
howToGetIt: Call Program Coordinator, Marlena Alva at 415-696-4552 or send email to alvam@sfusd.edu Call the other Program Coordinator, Andrew Vargas at 415-517-4573 or send email to vargasa3@sfusd.edu
